argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eldif | |- ( A e. ( RR \ QQ ) <-> ( A e. RR /\ -. A e. QQ ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_qre | |- ( B e. QQ -> B e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | #P_readdcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A + B ) e. RR ) |

| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. QQ ) -> ( ( A + B ) e. QQ -> ( ( A + B ) - B ) e. QQ ) ) |

| 10 |  | #P_qcn | |- ( B e. QQ -> B e. CC ) |

| 13 | 12 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. QQ ) -> ( ( ( A + B ) - B ) e. QQ <-> A e. QQ ) ) |

| 16 | 15 | #P_ex | |- ( A e. RR -> ( B e. QQ -> ( -. A e. QQ -> -. ( A + B ) e. QQ ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_com23 | |- ( A e. RR -> ( -. A e. QQ -> ( B e. QQ -> -. ( A + B ) e. QQ ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_imp31 | |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ -. A e. QQ ) /\ B e. QQ ) -> -. ( A + B ) e. QQ ) |
